Docs.summary: Creates a new object if there is any listener to the Activity, returns otherwise.
Docs.returns: The created object or if there are no listeners.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
If the Activity object is created, it will not start automatically. Callers need to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Activity.Start> to start it.
